mapper.select: select rv_star as rvstar,rv_img as rvImg, rv_content as rvcontent from rv where rv_usid=#{userId}

select ZZ_spCode as zzspCode,sp_location as location,SP_TOPIMG as sptopimg from( select rownum rn, ZZ_spCode,sp.sp_location,sp.SP_TOPIMG from zz INNER JOIN sp on ZZ_spCode = sp_code where zz.zz_usid = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
